statements: SELECT * FROM ip_blacklist;
SELECT id, ip_address, reason FROM ip_blacklist WHERE ip_address = '192.168.0.1';
SELECT * FROM ip_blacklist WHERE CREATED_AT >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, reason, blocked_at FROM ip_blacklist WHERE reason LIKE 'malicious%';
SELECT id, ip_address, blocked_at FROM ip_blacklist ORDER BY blocked_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM ip_blacklist WHERE blocked_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM ip_blacklist WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%';
SELECT id, ip_address, blocked_at FROM ip_blacklist ORDER BY blocked_at DESC;
SELECT id, ip_address, reason FROM ip_blacklist WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT id, reason, blocked_at FROM ip_blacklist WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address = '127.0.0.1';
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY ip_address DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT * FROM fraud_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM fraud_attempts WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%';
SELECT * FROM fraud_attempts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT id, ip_address, timestamp FROM fraud_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_attempts, ip_address FROM fraud_attempts GROUP BY ip_address HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses WHERE reason='Suspicious';
SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_date DESC;
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY ip_address;
SELECT comment_id, comment, comment_date FROM user_comments WHERE ip_address='192.168.1.100';
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ip_addresses WHERE reason LIKE '%spam%'
SELECT ip_address, COUNT(*) AS total_activities FROM fraudulent_activities GROUP BY ip_address;
SELECT ip_address, activity_type, activity_date FROM fraudulent_activities ORDER BY activity_date ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT user_comments.comment_id, user_comments.comment, user_comments.comment_date, blacklisted_ip_addresses.ip_address FROM user_comments JOIN blacklisted_ip_addresses ON user_comments.ip_address = blacklisted_ip_addresses.ip_address WHERE user_comments.comment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT ip_address, reason, date_added FROM blacklisted_ips;
SELECT activity_id, ip_address, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM fraudulent_activities;
SELECT report_id, ip_address, report_description, reporter_name, report_timestamp FROM reports;
SELECT log_id, action_type, ip_address, log_details, log_timestamp FROM audit_logs;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE ip_address = '192.168.1.1';
SELECT ip_address, reason, date_added FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE reason='Suspicious activity' ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, ip_address, activity_timestamp FROM fraudulent_activities WHERE activity_type='Phishing' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT report_id, ip_address, report_description, reporter_name, report_timestamp FROM reports WHERE reporter_name='John Doe' ORDER BY report_timestamp DESC;
SELECT log_id, action_type, ip_address, log_details, log_timestamp FROM audit_logs WHERE action_type='Login attempt' ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM blacklisted_ips UNION SELECT * FROM fraudulent_activities UNION SELECT * FROM reports;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT log_id, action, user_id, log_date FROM audit_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips WHERE blacklisted_at >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ip_address, reason FROM blacklisted_ips ORDER BY blacklisted_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, action, log_date FROM audit_logs WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
